name: LABELAB
legal: Limited Liability Company under Italian law
goal: Consultancy and technical assistance in the domains of sustainable energy, water and waste management. Support to local communities and private companies to manage and effectively provide public services. Setting up and maintenance of open-data sources on waste, water and environmental information.
interests: Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Research and Technology, Transport
euInitiatives:
Waste legislation and regulation
EC Communications on Energy Union
Circular Economy package
Directive on Energy Efficiency
